column1: ^Working Class
@Riot
&Working class starts a riot, largely punished those who did nothing, but also sacrifice time and money of themselves.*
Riot lasted 3 years now, government forced them to go back to their posistion.*
Riot lasted 6 years now, government, again, forced them to go back to their posistion.*
Working class keeps ignores government, and the riot finally become a civil war.*
&Because of riot of working class, nuclear plant forced to clsed.*
Riot from working class strongly impacted your free riding activites.*
@Working Class Public transportation
&Instead of commute by cars, working class decides to commute by public transportations.*
@Working Class Local seasonal food
&Working class aims for local and seasonal food to buy, though they can't get everything they want.*
@Strike
&Working class is in a strike now*
&Because of the strike of working class, company needs more revenue to find working forces*
@Protest
&Working class is protesting.*
&Working class increases your pressure because of their protest.*
Working class blames on you and largely increased your pressure by protesting.*
Working class emphasizes on your extensive electricity usages, decreases your brand impact.*
@Working Class Meat
&Working class decides to eat less meat, though vegitables are still expensive.*
@Oneself
&Working class falls into self-doubt.*
^Middle Class
@AC
&Middle class starts to decrease usage of AC.*
Middle class experienced a lot more heat stroke due to climate change and short on AC.*
@Middle Class Public transportation
&Instead of commute by cars, middle class decides to commute by public transportations.*
@Middle Class Meat
&Middle class decides to eat less meat, though vegitables are still expensive.*
@Building
&Middle class changes their house, though that means further away from work or higher living fee.*
@Climate injustice
&Middle class emphasizes on climate injustice.*
@Middle Class Local seasonal food
&Middle class aims for local and seasonal food to buy, though they can't get everything they want.*
@Not enough power
&Middle class gives up on making a change*
^Upper Class
@Fly
&Upper class tries to fly less, though they need more time on commuting.*
@Divest
&Upper class divest those non-environmental friendly industries, though they lose a lot of potential money making opportunities.*
@Electric Car
&Upper class changes their car to electric one, though the process of generating electricity might not be green.*
@Upper Class Local seasonal food
&Upper class aims for local and seasonal food to buy, though they need to change their diet a lot.*
@Upper Class Public transportation
&Instead of commute by cars, upper class decides to commute by public transportations.*
@others do it
&Upper class thinks that other people should make the change first, to avoid risks.*
@Advertise
&Upper class advertises self, though only they know themselves are the real role model or not.*
^Company
@Change plastic package
&Company replaces their piastic packages. Will customers pay for this expense or the company?*
@APSS
&Company starts to develop this system, costing money and time.*
Company finished the development of system, increased the efficiency a lot!*
The increase of efficiency slows down because R&D has reached a bottleneck.*
@Nuclear
&Company decides to use nuclear power, fairly envitomental friendly but dangerous as well.*
@Renewable energy
&Company changes their energy souce to renwable one, though place to generate and store them is still a problem.*
@Product lives
&Company lengthens their product lives, as demands goes down, profit goes down as well.*
@Reduce energy use
&Company starts to saves energy from workplace, though workers might endure worse working condition. *
@Not enough benefit
&Making profit is the core value of a company, so ignore those unbeneficial events.*
^Policymaker
@Ban Ads
&New policy bans non-environmental friendly ads from stations.*
@Control fossil fuel
&Policy decreases the usgae of fossil fuel but also increases cost of battery and renewable energy.*
@Single-use plastic
&Policy trying to cut single-use plastic to zero, though cost of those products will go up.*
@Education
&Policy pushes environmental education in public schools. It's a long term plan.*
@Reduce new road
&Policy slows down speed of constructing new road, but also slows down econimic growth.*
@Resiliency
&Policy requires new buildings to have enough resiliency, to defend sea level rise.*
@Defend
&There not much thing policy can do with climate change, but we can be prepared to defend it.*
